title: Hypnotic Fascination - the power of the gaze / Hypnotizing without words - non-verbal hypnosis
description:
During hypnotic Fascination the hypnotherapist is using only the power of his gaze. In this way, he is able to induce powerful and deep hypnotic states, without saying any words. In our gaze there is a secret power and Dr. Paret teaches hypnotic Fascination and Mesmerism on his non-verbal hypnosis masterclasses. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
